data.text: @francvs Hi! here is your unroll: https://t.co/2cYvqq6HR6 Enjoy :) 🤖
@CEXAlsobrooks Can the county employees sit and use the lounges @ work now!! So they have somewhere to eat!
@CEXAlsobrooks I will definitely be wearing mine for a while!. Let's see how this unmaking goes.
@Vanture @CEXAlsobrooks Really hoping they do a reassessment of what they just announced….the delays in announcing changes is reflective of how this county operates.
@CEXAlsobrooks Too late bitch. We’ll remember what you did to our children and small businesses.
@CEXAlsobrooks we are growing tired of your sanctimony , stop masking children , end all requirements! 🇺🇸

@CEXAlsobrooks Can you please examine the CDC guidance that came out just after your announcement and provide updates to guidance for schools? If the CDC’s guidance says we’re good, please don’t make our kids wait on a bureaucratic process to make it “official.”

@CEXAlsobrooks Can you check this against the updated guidance from the CDC this afternoon? Also, since PG County is evaluated as Low per the CDC county check, when can our kids stop wearing masks in schools?
